I love to eat.

Thanks to @jeffjarvis for the recommendation of Elie Mystal's audiobook. Just listened to the first hour. It's irreverent, direct, eye-opening and important. https://t.co/XOsSdtmY2p

BTW the first feed was mine. Hereâ€™s the announcement. https://t.co/cK8fMop2hk This is why we needed blogging before anything else. It was the way new tech innovation could be announced when journalism was ignoring it.

I canâ€™t imagine Lebron has any fans left after heâ€™s left so many teams. Itâ€™s not just that he wins championships, itâ€™s that he leaves behind wrecks. Fans donâ€™t want to win as much as we want to love. Iâ€™m glad he never chose the Knicks. https://t.co/1tS1mYrNpf
I canâ€™t imagine another team accepting LeBron unless he swears he will leave the team in better condition than he found it. That would be something worth giving a try. go to Orlando, for example, and donâ€™t bring any stars with you, just work. And do it for a dollar a year.

BTW the first feed was mine. Hereâ€™s the announcement. This is why we needed blogging before anything else. It was the way new tech innovation could be announced when journalism was ignoring it. https://t.co/Nt4PVoXerR https://t.co/cK8fMop2hk

This is encouraging. Not the final deal, but not a terrible one either. @sarahkendzior -- who I usually agree with, does not like it. I don't Russia is any old autocracy, they have the nukes. Think past this step where the nukes go away if that's possible. How to get there? https://t.co/BGMnVXROHc
Sarah -- highly recommend listening to the current episode of Radio Open Source about nuclear war.
https://t.co/VOsV4kTa7k
@sabre23t that was not necessary.

@Kasparov63 I'm sure you understand Russia much better than I do, but still, I think it's worth a chance to see if the situation doesn't get resolved without destroying civilization. Once we're in a shooting war with Russia there will be no more time to think.
The Cheapest New Electric Cars You Can Buy in 2022. https://t.co/cjjLhVAN6d

I revel in how much the Lakers suck. Feel bad for the individual players except Lebron whose hubris is the fatal flaw. And poor Melo, he was desperately hoping to at least be on a playoff team. https://t.co/7cg7FD9v7v

And Bloombergâ€” thereâ€™s no amount of money they should take to further tarnish their name than Exxon. When I hear the name Bloomberg on Twitter this is what I think of now: â€œDonâ€™t click. Paywall.â€

What a disgusting combo. Fuck you bloomberg and esp fuck you Exxon, we donâ€™t need to capture fucking carbon that was never fucking dumped into our fucking atmosphere. https://t.co/pAE6zPvOaZ
Exxon is one of those names like Hitler and Facebook that they should change because you might as well call your company Evil Corp or somesuch.
